source.class:
*
This class represents a system of units, it groups units together * for historical or cultural reasons. Nothing prevents a unit from * belonging to several system of units at the same time * (for example an imperial system would have many of the units * held by {@link NonSI}). Jean-Marie Dautelle 4.2, August 26, 2007
